comments.text:
I did a gloval search and got the following

People
29 involding XX
29 involving Ludovic Hirlimann

I clicked on xx and choosed does not involve XXX. Nothing happened.

I caught the following in the Error console :
Error: facet.newest is null
Source File: chrome://messenger/content/glodaFacetVis.js
Line: 110

Current theory is that negating my filter woul remove all the results.

I did a gloval search and got the following
